name: The Five Doctors
overview: A Doctor Who adventure. The time scoop is being misused to transport you and your other selves from their proper places in time and space to the death zone on Gallifrey. Someone is using you to secure the Ring of Rassilon on their behalf. Your aims are to become whole again by joining withal of your other selves, including your fourth self who is trapped in the vortex, and to discover who or what is misusing the time scoop. Loosely based on the 25th Anniversary special of the popular British science fiction television show, Doctor Who.
